subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Among the six new N.F.L. quarterbacks who started on Sunday, the Broncos’ Tim Tebow had the only win and the Vikings’ Christian Ponder had the most promising debut.
snippet: Among the six new N.F.L. quarterbacks who started on Sunday, the Broncos’ Tim Tebow had the only win and the Vikings’ Christian Ponder had the most promising debut.
